title: Featured Work
text:
Featured Work














PWHL Goalie Tracker
This fan-friendly dashboard showcases goalie statistics and team rankings for the inaugural season of the Professional Women’s Hockey League (PWHL). 
App   GitHub Repo












Solar Savers: Solar Panel Cost-Effectiveness
A dashboard application developed collaboratively and designed to assist Canadian homeowners in making informed solar panel purchasing decisions. 
App   GitHub Repo












Leveraging the Power of AI in Education: Insider Perspectives and Practices
An article discussing educator perspectives on AI in education, containing my insights paired with survey-based results of effective implementations and concerns. 
Medium Article












Airbnb Analysis
This project implements machine learning models to predict listing prices based on property features. It offers insights into the key factors that drive pricing trends.  
GitHub Repo












eda_mds
This package accelerates the EDA stage of machine learning projects by enhancing the core EDA functions in pandas python package. It includes four functions designed to deliver deeper insights and identify potential issues in datasets. 
GitHub Repo  Vingette












Red Wine Quality Prediction
This project employs machine learning models to predict red wine quality, based on its physiochemical properties. 
GitHub Repo  Report

This project aimed to create a classification model to predict red wine quality based on its physiochemical properties. The best model showed reasonable accuracy, highlighting areas for improvement in handling outliers.

title: Nicole Bidwell
text:
Nicole Bidwell
 Data Science Specialist | Educator

title: Contact
text:
Contact




I welcome your thoughts and insights! Whether you have questions, feedback, or have ideas for collaboration, I’m happy to connect.

title: Nicole Bidwell
text:
Hi! I’m Nicole, a Data Science Specialist with a rewarding career in education. Obtaining a Master of Data Science from the University of British Columbia, and a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics from Simon Fraser University, has built my foundation in data analysis, machine learning and statistical modeling. Working in education—including roles as a Senior Mathematics Teacher and Guidance Counselor—has refined my problem-solving skills and ability to communicate complex topics to diverse audiences. I now apply these skills in data science to uncover insights and facilitate data-driven decisions.
Beyond my professional pursuits, you’ll find me immersed in activities like hockey, hiking, travel, and promoting mental well-being. This website serves as a platform to share my projects and passions, offering a glimpse into how my unique experiences and interests shape my approach to data science.

title: Featured Work
text:
Nicole Bidwell
 Data Science Specialist | Educator 

          





 


Hi! I’m Nicole, a Data Science Specialist with a rewarding career in education. Obtaining a Master of Data Science from the University of British Columbia, and a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics from Simon Fraser University, has built my foundation in data analysis, machine learning and statistical modeling. Working in education—including roles as a Senior Mathematics Teacher and Guidance Counselor—has refined my problem-solving skills and ability to communicate complex topics to diverse audiences. I now apply these skills in data science to uncover insights and facilitate data-driven decisions.
Beyond my professional pursuits, you’ll find me immersed in activities like hockey, hiking, travel, and promoting mental well-being. This website serves as a platform to share my projects and passions, offering a glimpse into how my unique experiences and interests shape my approach to data science.
